name: OnelinkNightlight
0:
”Alexa, turn on Office”
”Alexa, set Baby Room to green”
”Alexa, brighten the Bedroom by 70%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Add convenience to your home with the Onelink Safe & Sound Night Light Alexa skill. You and your family can simply ask Alexa to adjust and change your night light on your Onelink Safe & Sound. The night light is even customizable, so every member of your family can select their favorite color.

Let’s get started by selecting the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa App to link your Onelink Account. Once enabled and your account is linked you can say Alexa, make ‘family room’ blue. 
To learn more visit onelink.firstalert.com
